value_claims.claim_title: Demand forecasting efficiency improved 10x with Vertex AI
value_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm achieved up to 10 times more efficient demand forecasting by implementing Vertex AI AutoML model, enabling faster and more accurate predictions of product demand across their ecommerce platform.
value_claims.source_quote: Using Vertex AI AutoML model, the impact on our ecommerce site has been tremendous. Super-Pharm's demand forecasting is up to 10 times more efficient now.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Vertex AI AutoML model is explicitly credited as the technology that directly enabled the 10x efficiency improvement in demand forecasting.

value_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm improved inventory accuracy from approximately 50% to 90% using Vertex AI, enabling better stock availability predictions and reducing abandoned carts due to out-of-stock items.
value_claims.source_quote: Our accuracy has improved to 90%, when it was previously about 50%
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The accuracy improvement is directly attributed to Vertex AI AutoML model implementation, as stated in the same quote discussing Vertex AI's impact.

value_claims.claim_title: Reduced workforce requirement for demand forecasting
value_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm reduced reliance on an eight-person in-house team for demand forecasting and decreased logistical burden on in-store employees through Vertex AI automation.
value_claims.source_quote: Before using Vertex AI, Super-Pharm relied on an eight-person, in-house team for demand forecasting, along with placing much of the logistical burden on in-store employees and managers.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Vertex AI is explicitly stated as the solution that enabled Super-Pharm to reduce dependency on the eight-person team and ease employee burden.

value_claims.claim_title: Enhanced employee recruitment and retention through modernization
value_claims.claim_description: Migration to Google Cloud improved Super-Pharm's ability to attract and retain Millennial and Gen-Z employees who were discouraged by outdated legacy systems and expect modern cloud tools.
value_claims.source_quote: Transitioning to Google Cloud has been a game-changer for staying competitive as an employer and recruiting talent. Our new Millennial and Gen-Z employees were discouraged by our outdated systems.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Google Cloud modernization is a contributing factor to improved recruitment, but AI specifically is not the direct cause; it's the broader cloud infrastructure modernization.

value_claims.claim_title: Optimized customer journey on ecommerce site
value_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm optimized the on-site customer journey through improved demand forecasting and inventory accuracy, reducing abandoned carts and improving user experience.
value_claims.source_quote: Optimized on-site customer journey. Inaccurate demand forecasting and incorrect inventory analysis led to abandoned carts and dissatisfaction with user experience on-site.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The customer journey optimization is directly enabled by Vertex AI's demand forecasting and inventory accuracy improvements, which address the root causes of abandoned carts.

value_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm achieved the capability to guarantee customers could select in-stock products and ship items to the nearest brick-and-mortar store within 24 hours through improved inventory management.
value_claims.source_quote: Super-Pharm needed to guarantee that consumers could select in-stock products, purchase them, and ship the items to the brick-and-mortar store nearest to them within 24 hours.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: Vertex AI's demand forecasting and inventory accuracy improvements are key contributors to enabling this capability, along with BigQuery data infrastructure.

value_claims.claim_title: Transformed data into actionable insights with BigQuery
value_claims.claim_description: BigQuery enabled Super-Pharm to transform extensive historical data into actionable insights for demand forecasting and smarter logistics, including warehouse efficiency and inventory transfers.
value_claims.source_quote: BigQuery enabled Super-Pharm to transform their data into actionable insights that are leveraged for demand forecasting and smarter logistics, including more efficient use of their warehouses.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: BigQuery provides the data infrastructure foundation that enables Vertex AI's ML models to function effectively, making it a contributing technology.

context_claims.claim_title: Super-Pharm is Israel's leading drugstore chain
context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm operates 290 branches in Israel (via franchisees), 80 branches in Poland, and an ecommerce website. Founded in 1978, it is the leading pharmacy and beauty retailer in Israel.
context_claims.source_quote: Super-Pharm was founded in 1978, and today, it is the leading pharmacy and beauty retailer in Israel with 290 branches across the country (operated by franchisees), 80 branches in Poland.

context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm operates in the retail sector, specifically pharmacy and beauty products, with both physical stores and ecommerce channels.
context_claims.source_quote: Industry: Retail. Super-Pharm is the leading pharmacy and beauty retailer in Israel.

context_claims.claim_description: Recently, Super-Pharm's online sales exceeded their physical store revenue, marking a significant shift in their business model and channel mix.
context_claims.source_quote: Online sales recently surpassed brick-and-mortar revenue for Super-Pharm, Israel's leading drugstore.

context_claims.claim_title: Focus on click-and-collect as promising revenue stream
context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm identified click-and-collect (buy online, pick up in store) as an especially promising revenue stream for the business.
context_claims.source_quote: Super-Pharm's click-and-collect option, which enables customers to buy online and pick up at a physical store near their homes, emerged as an especially promising revenue stream.

context_claims.claim_title: Managing tens of thousands of inventory items
context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm needed to analyze and manage inventory for tens of thousands of product items across their retail network.
context_claims.source_quote: The company needed a big-picture, accurate analysis of its inventory of tens of thousands of items.

context_claims.claim_title: Demand forecasting and inventory management function
context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm implemented AI for demand forecasting and inventory management to predict customer demand and optimize stock levels across locations.
context_claims.source_quote: Demand forecasting for products, based on previous sales history and logical predictions, was the key to ensuring that the right stock was available at the correct locations.
context_claims.apqc_name: Manage demand for products and services

context_claims.claim_title: Ecommerce and digital customer experience function
context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm focused on optimizing their ecommerce website to provide stellar user experience and competitive online shopping capabilities.
context_claims.source_quote: As a retail business operating in the rapidly-evolving ecommerce space, it was clear that we needed to provide our customers with an outstanding online shopping experience.

context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm's on-premise systems were unable to handle data complexity and volumes needed for accurate demand forecasting, limiting their analytical capabilities.
context_claims.source_quote: Because of complexity and data volumes, on-premise tools were unable to keep up with predicting customers' demand and thus managing inventory requirements.

context_claims.claim_title: Partnership with Google Cloud and implementation partners
context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm worked with Google Cloud directly, data science company Intellerts for ML implementation, and WideOps for cloud migration and infrastructure setup.
context_claims.source_quote: Data science solutions company Intellerts was also a crucial partner in Super-Pharm's Vertex AI implementation. Google Cloud partner WideOps was a major driving force behind Super-Pharm's successful transition.

context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm operates a MarketPlace website where product categorization and virtual shelf placement are critical for sales optimization.
context_claims.source_quote: Super-Pharm is using Gemini AI to auto categorize products in their MarketPlace website.

context_claims.claim_title: Multi-brand retail portfolio including Erroca eyewear
context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm owns the eyewear chain Erroca with over 60 branches, in addition to their pharmacy and beauty retail operations.
context_claims.source_quote: Super-Pharm also owns the eyewear chain Erroca, with over 60 branches.

context_claims.claim_description: Super-Pharm applied AI insights to optimize warehouse space utilization and plan inventory transfers between locations.
context_claims.source_quote: BigQuery enabled Super-Pharm to transform their data into actionable insights that are leveraged for demand forecasting and smarter logistics, including more efficient use of their warehouses.
